title: Isn't everything technically natural?
description: Answer (1 of 7): Yes, in the sense that even "unnatural" human-made stuff (like Fritos, Cheetohs, and poodles) don't exist in the wild, they are made by nature. Because nature made humans, and therefore anything humans make is natural. (Though my organic-only wife probably would never see it that...
